assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: algoWatt S.p.A, a greentech solutions company, designs, develops, and integrates solutions for the management of energy and natural resources worldwide. The company offers building energy management system for the smart building sector; GeoGuard, an end-to-end service for the monitoring of critical infrastructure and natural hazards; MP48 technology to offer products, systems, and integrated solutions for every application in the industrial, infrastructure, residential, and utilities fields; RTu-Go, an equipment for the field's device management in the industrial, infrastructure, housing, and utilities markets; and Teneo, an software solution for ordinary and extraordinary maintenance management. It also provides easytrack, which controls and manages the fleet; eMile system that allows to organize and manage interchange area; eMIXER multi-channel platform; OPPTIMA, a solution for the management and satellite monitoring of fleets; PERSONALBUS, a solution for managing flexible transport services for all areas of mobility; and tow service manager for roadside assistance management. In addition, the company offers Adverto, a flexible system for supervision, control, and intelligent integration of heterogeneous technology environments; Adverto dump, a landfill control system; Adverto Road solution for remote and road telecontrol; Adverto Tlc for telecommunications sector; invoicing and metering solutions; energy smart optimization system; and Libra, a scalable and modular platform for the management of operational processes of balancing service provider. Further, it produces energy from renewable sources, such as solar. It serves large utilities, distributors and grid operators, power producers, public authorities, industrial customers, and investors. The company was formerly known as TerniEnergia S.p.A. and changed its name to algoWatt S.p.A. in March 2020. algoWatt S.p.A. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
